trans-unit.source: Sqlite will save the db with this filename.
trans-unit.target: Sqlite will save the db with this filename.

trans-unit.source: Unencrypted, temporary password. App will encrypt it and delete this.
trans-unit.target: Unencrypted, temporary password. App will encrypt it and delete this.
Dossier de la base de données

trans-unit.source: All file-based data will be stored here (sqlite database, job history data).
trans-unit.target: All file-based data will be stored here (sqlite database, job history data).

trans-unit.source: Creates these users in the DB during startup if they do not exist. If a user with this name exist, it won't be overwritten, even if the role is different.
trans-unit.target: Creates these users in the DB during startup if they do not exist. If a user with this name exist, it won't be overwritten, even if the role is different.

trans-unit.source: if true, 'lanczos3' will used to scale photos, otherwise faster but lower quality 'nearest'.
trans-unit.target: if true, 'lanczos3' will used to scale photos, otherwise faster but lower quality 'nearest'.

trans-unit.source: Person face size ratio on the face thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Person face size ratio on the face thumbnail.

trans-unit.source: Filters out entry that are closer than this in meters.
trans-unit.target: Filters out entry that are closer than this in meters.

trans-unit.source: Filters out entry that are closer than this in time in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Filters out entry that are closer than this in time in milliseconds.

trans-unit.source: After creating a sharing link, it can be updated for this long.
trans-unit.target: After creating a sharing link, it can be updated for this long.

trans-unit.source: If there was no indexing in this time, it reindexes. (skipped if indexes are in DB and sensitivity is low).
trans-unit.target: If there was no indexing in this time, it reindexes. (skipped if indexes are in DB and sensitivity is low).

trans-unit.source: Set the reindexing sensitivity. High value check the folders for change more often.
trans-unit.target: Set the reindexing sensitivity. High value check the folders for change more often.

trans-unit.source: Folders to exclude from indexing. If an entry starts with '/' it is treated as an absolute path. If it doesn't start with '/' but contains a '/', the path is relative to the image directory. If it doesn't contain a '/', any folder with this name will be excluded.
trans-unit.target: Folders to exclude from indexing. If an entry starts with '/' it is treated as an absolute path. If it doesn't start with '/' but contains a '/', the path is relative to the image directory. If it doesn't contain a '/', any folder with this name will be excluded.
List des fichiers à exclure de l'indexation

trans-unit.source: Files that mark a folder to be excluded from indexing. Any folder that contains a file with this name will be excluded from indexing.
trans-unit.target: Files that mark a folder to be excluded from indexing. Any folder that contains a file with this name will be excluded from indexing.

trans-unit.source: Runs directory scanning and thumbnail generation in a different thread.
trans-unit.target: Runs directory scanning and thumbnail generation in a different thread.

trans-unit.source: Number of threads that are used to generate thumbnails. If 0, number of 'CPU cores -1' threads will be used.
trans-unit.target: Number of threads that are used to generate thumbnails. If 0, number of 'CPU cores -1' threads will be used.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of duplicates to list.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of duplicates to list.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the app ads "Server-Timing" http header to the response.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, the app ads "Server-Timing" http header to the response.

trans-unit.source: Jobs load this many photos or videos form the DB for processing at once.
trans-unit.target: Jobs load this many photos or videos form the DB for processing at once.

trans-unit.source: Target bit rate of the output video will be scaled down this this. This should be less than the upload rate of your home server.
trans-unit.target: Target bit rate of the output video will be scaled down this this. This should be less than the upload rate of your home server.

trans-unit.source: The height of the output video will be scaled down to this, while keeping the aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: La hauteur de la vidéo de sortie sera réduite à cette valeur, tout en conservant le rapport hauteur/largeur.

trans-unit.source: Target frame per second (fps) of the output video will be scaled down this this.
trans-unit.target: Le nombre d'images par seconde (IPS) de la vidéo de sortie sera réduit à cette valeur.

trans-unit.source: The range of the Constant Rate Factor (CRF) scale is 0–51, where 0 is lossless, 23 is the default, and 51 is worst quality possible.
trans-unit.target: La plage de l'échelle du facteur de débit constant (CRF) est de 0 à 51 : 0 est sans perte, 23 est la valeur par défaut et 51 est la pire qualité possible.

trans-unit.source: A preset is a collection of options that will provide a certain encoding speed to compression ratio. A slower preset will provide better compression (compression is quality per filesize).
trans-unit.target: Un préréglage est une collection d'options qui fournissent une certaine vitesse d'encodage par rapport au ratio de compression. Un préréglage plus lent fournira une meilleure compression (la compression est la qualité par taille de fichier).

trans-unit.source: It will be sent to ffmpeg as it is, as custom options.
trans-unit.target: It will be sent to ffmpeg as it is, as custom options.

trans-unit.source: To ensure smooth video playback, video transcoding is recommended to a lower bit rate than the server's upload rate. The transcoded videos will be save to the thumbnail folder. You can trigger the transcoding manually, but you can also create an automatic encoding job in advanced settings mode.
trans-unit.target: To ensure smooth video playback, video transcoding is recommended to a lower bit rate than the server's upload rate. The transcoded videos will be save to the thumbnail folder. You can trigger the transcoding manually, but you can also create an automatic encoding job in advanced settings mode.

trans-unit.source: Converts photos on the fly, when they are requested.
trans-unit.target: Convertit les photos à la volée, lorsqu'elles sont demandées.

trans-unit.source: The shorter edge of the converted photo will be scaled down to this, while keeping the aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: Le bord le plus court de la photo convertie sera réduit à cette échelle, tout en conservant le rapport d'aspect.

trans-unit.source: Filters the sub-folders with this search query. If filter results no photo, the app will search again without the filter.
trans-unit.target: Filters the sub-folders with this search query. If filter results no photo, the app will search again without the filter.

trans-unit.source: If multiple preview is available sorts them by these methods and selects the first one.
trans-unit.target: Si plusieurs aperçus sont disponibles, les trier selon ces méthodes et sélectionner le premier.

trans-unit.source: Images are loaded from this folder (read permission required)
trans-unit.target: Les images sont chargées à partir de ce dossier (permission de lecture requise)

trans-unit.source: Thumbnails, converted photos, videos will be stored here (write permission required)
trans-unit.target: Les vignettes, les photos converties et les vidéos seront stockées ici (autorisation d'écriture requise).

trans-unit.source: Only this many bites will be loaded when scanning photo/video for metadata. Increase this number if your photos shows up as square.
trans-unit.target: Only this many bites will be loaded when scanning photo/video for metadata. Increase this number if your photos shows up as square.

trans-unit.source: Video support uses ffmpeg. ffmpeg and ffprobe binaries need to be available in the PATH or the @ffmpeg-installer/ffmpeg and @ffprobe-installer/ffprobe optional node packages need to be installed.
trans-unit.target: Video support uses ffmpeg. ffmpeg and ffprobe binaries need to be available in the PATH or the @ffmpeg-installer/ffmpeg and @ffprobe-installer/ffprobe optional node packages need to be installed.

trans-unit.source: Users kept logged in for this long time.
trans-unit.target: Users kept logged in for this long time.

trans-unit.source: Port number. Port 80 is usually what you need.
trans-unit.target: Numéro de port. Le port 80 est généralement ce dont vous avez besoin.

trans-unit.source: Server will accept connections from this IPv6 or IPv4 address.
trans-unit.target: Le serveur acceptera les connexions à partir de cette adresse IPv6 ou IPv4.

trans-unit.source: If you add a new folder to your gallery, the site indexes it automatically. If you would like to trigger indexing manually, click index button. (Note: search only works among the indexed directories.)
trans-unit.target: If you add a new folder to your gallery, the site indexes it automatically. If you would like to trigger indexing manually, click index button. (Note: search only works among the indexed directories.)

trans-unit.source: Show hints while typing search query.
trans-unit.target: Afficher des conseils pendant la saisie de la requête de recherche.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number autocomplete items shown per category.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number autocomplete items shown per category.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number autocomplete items shown at once.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number autocomplete items shown at once.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of photos and videos that are listed in one search result.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of photos and videos that are listed in one search result.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of directories that are listed in one search result.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of directories that are listed in one search result.

trans-unit.source: Search returns also with directories, not just media.
trans-unit.target: Search returns also with directories, not just media.

trans-unit.source: Search also returns with metafiles from directories that contain a media file of the matched search result.
trans-unit.target: Search also returns with metafiles from directories that contain a media file of the matched search result.
Permet d'activer des liens de partage protégés par un mot de passe.

trans-unit.source: Map will use thumbnail images as markers instead of the default pin.
trans-unit.target: La carte utilisera des images miniatures comme marqueurs au lieu de l'épingle par défaut.

trans-unit.source: MapBox needs an access token to work, create one at https://www.mapbox.com.
trans-unit.target: MapBox needs an access token to work, create one at https://www.mapbox.com.

trans-unit.source: The map module will use these urls to fetch the map tiles.
trans-unit.target: The map module will use these urls to fetch the map tiles.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of markers to be shown on the map preview on the gallery page.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of markers to be shown on the map preview on the gallery page.

trans-unit.source: Size of the thumbnails. The best matching size will be generated. More sizes give better quality, but use more storage and CPU to render. If size is 240, that shorter side of the thumbnail will have 160 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Size of the thumbnails. The best matching size will be generated. More sizes give better quality, but use more storage and CPU to render. If size is 240, that shorter side of the thumbnail will have 160 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Shows the number photos and videos on the navigation bar.
trans-unit.target: Shows the number photos and videos on the navigation bar.

trans-unit.source: Visible links in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: Visible links in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Default time interval for displaying a photo in the slide show.
trans-unit.target: Default time interval for displaying a photo in the slide show.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, lightbox will always show caption by default, not only on hover.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, lightbox will always show caption by default, not only on hover.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, lightbox will always show faces by default, not only on hover.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, lightbox will always show faces by default, not only on hover.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, lightbox will loop videos by default.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, lightbox will loop videos by default.

trans-unit.source: Caches directory contents and search results for better performance.
trans-unit.target: Met en cache le contenu des répertoires et les résultats des recherches pour une meilleure performance.
Génération de vignettes basées sur le défilement

trans-unit.source: Those thumbnails get higher priority that are visible on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Les vignettes visibles à l'écran ont une priorité plus élevée.

trans-unit.source: Default sorting method for photo and video in a directory results.
trans-unit.target: Default sorting method for photo and video in a directory results.

trans-unit.source: Default sorting method for photo and video in a search results.
trans-unit.target: Default sorting method for photo and video in a search results.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, directories will be sorted by date, like photos, otherwise by name. Directory date is the last modification time of that directory not the creation date of the oldest photo.
trans-unit.target: Si cette option est activée, les répertoires seront triés par date, comme les photos, sinon par nom. La date du répertoire est la date de dernière modification de ce répertoire et non la date de création de la photo la plus ancienne.

trans-unit.source: Those thumbnails will be rendered first that are in view.
trans-unit.target: Those thumbnails will be rendered first that are in view.

trans-unit.source: Show the caption (IPTC 120) tags from the EXIF data instead of the filenames.
trans-unit.target: Affichez les balises Légende (IPTC 120) à partir des données EXIF ​​au lieu des noms de fichiers.

trans-unit.source: Enable download zip of a directory contents Directory flattening. (Does not work for searches.)
trans-unit.target: Enable download zip of a directory contents Directory flattening. (Does not work for searches.)

trans-unit.source: Adds a button to flattens the file structure, by listing the content of all subdirectories. (Won't work if the gallery has multiple folders with the same path.)
trans-unit.target: Adds a button to flattens the file structure, by listing the content of all subdirectories. (Won't work if the gallery has multiple folders with the same path.)

trans-unit.source: Video formats that are supported after transcoding (with the build-in ffmpeg support).
trans-unit.target: Video formats that are supported after transcoding (with the build-in ffmpeg support).

trans-unit.source: Video formats that are supported also without transcoding. Browser supported formats: https://www.w3schools.com/html/html5_video.asp
trans-unit.target: Video formats that are supported also without transcoding. Browser supported formats: https://www.w3schools.com/html/html5_video.asp

trans-unit.source: Load full resolution image on zoom.
trans-unit.target: Load full resolution image on zoom.

trans-unit.source: Enables loading the full resolution image on zoom in the ligthbox (preview).
trans-unit.target: Permet de charger l'image en pleine résolution lors du zoom dans la lightbox (aperçu).

trans-unit.source: Photo formats that are supported. Browser needs to support these formats natively. Also sharp (libvips) package should be able to convert these formats.
trans-unit.target: Photo formats that are supported. Browser needs to support these formats natively. Also sharp (libvips) package should be able to convert these formats.

trans-unit.source: Enables lossy (based on delta time and distance. Too frequent points are removed) GPX compression.
trans-unit.target: Enables lossy (based on delta time and distance. Too frequent points are removed) GPX compression.

trans-unit.source: Reads *.gpx files and renders them on the map.
trans-unit.target: Lit les fichiers *.gpx et les affiche sur la carte.

trans-unit.source: Reads *.md files in a directory and shows the next to the map.
trans-unit.target: Lit les fichiers *.md et les affiche sur la carte.

trans-unit.source: Reads *.pg2conf files (You can use it for custom sorting and saved search (albums)).
trans-unit.target: Reads *.pg2conf files (You can use it for custom sorting and saved search (albums)).

trans-unit.source: The app will read and process these files.
trans-unit.target: The app will read and process these files.

trans-unit.source: If a photo has the same face (person) name and keyword, the app removes the duplicate, keeping the face only.
trans-unit.target: Si une photo comporte le même visage (personne), le même nom et le même mot-clé, l'application supprime le doublon et ne conserve que le visage.
Permission de mettre une visage en favori

trans-unit.source: Required minimum right to star (favourite) a face.
trans-unit.target: Permission minimale requise pour mettre un visage en favori.

trans-unit.source: Required minimum right to show the faces tab.
trans-unit.target: Required minimum right to show the faces tab.

trans-unit.source: If you access the page form local network its good to know the public url for creating sharing link.
trans-unit.target: If you access the page form local network its good to know the public url for creating sharing link.

trans-unit.source: If you access the gallery under a sub url (like: http://mydomain.com/myGallery), set it here. If it is not working you might miss the '/' from the beginning of the url.
trans-unit.target: Si vous accédez à la galerie sous une sous-URL (comme : http://mydomain.com/myGallery), mettez-le ici. Si cela ne fonctionne pas, il se peut qu'il manque le '/' au début de l'url.

trans-unit.source: Injects the content of this between the <head></head> HTML tags of the app. (You can use it add analytics or custom code to the app).
trans-unit.target: Injects the content of this between the <head></head> HTML tags of the app. (You can use it add analytics or custom code to the app).

trans-unit.source: Enables user management with login to password protect the gallery.
trans-unit.target: Enables user management with login to password protect the gallery.

trans-unit.source: Default user right when password protection is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Default user right when password protection is disabled.

trans-unit.source: This feature enables you to generate 'random photo' urls. That URL returns a photo random selected from your gallery. You can use the url with 3rd party application like random changing desktop background. Note: With the current implementation, random link also requires login.
trans-unit.target: This feature enables you to generate 'random photo' urls. That URL returns a photo random selected from your gallery. You can use the url with 3rd party application like random changing desktop background. Note: With the current implementation, random link also requires login.

trans-unit.source: These thumbnails will be generated. The list should be a subset of the enabled thumbnail sizes
trans-unit.target: Ces vignettes seront générées. La liste doit être un sous-ensemble des tailles de vignettes activées.

trans-unit.source: Only indexes a folder if it got changed.
trans-unit.target: Indexe un dossier uniquement s'il a été modifié.

trans-unit.source: To dismiss these notifications, restart the server.
trans-unit.target: Pour supprimer ces notifications, redémarrez le serveur.

trans-unit.note: title of left card in settings page that contains settings contents

trans-unit.source: Album is locked, cannot be deleted from the webpage.
trans-unit.target: L'album est verrouillé, il ne peut pas être supprimé de la page web.

trans-unit.source: Add this json to a '.saved_searches.pg2conf' file in your gallery:
trans-unit.target: Ajoutez ce json à un fichier '.saved_searches.pg2conf' dans votre galerie :

trans-unit.source: This saved search will be loaded from file during gallery indexing and it will survive a database reset.
trans-unit.target: Cette recherche sauvegardée sera chargée à partir du fichier lors de l'indexation de la galerie et elle survivra à une réinitialisation de la base de données.

trans-unit.source: Too many results to show. Refine your search.
trans-unit.target: Trop de résultats à afficher. Précisez votre recherche.
basculer en plein écran, touche : f
Erreur lors du chargement de la vidéo.

trans-unit.source: Most likely the video is not transcoded. It can be done in the settings. You need to transcode these videos to watch them online:
trans-unit.target: Il est fort probable que la vidéo ne soit pas transcodée. Cela peut être fait dans les paramètres. Vous devez transcoder ces vidéos pour les regarder en ligne :

trans-unit.source: Url has been copied to clipboard
trans-unit.target: l'URL a été copiée dans le presse-papier
Mauvais nom d'utilisateur ou mot de passe

trans-unit.source: It seems that you are running the application in a Docker container. This setting should not be changed in docker. Make sure, that you know what you are doing.
trans-unit.target: Il semble que vous exécutez l'application dans un conteneur Docker. Ce paramètre ne doit pas être modifié dans Docker. Assurez-vous que vous savez ce que vous faites.

trans-unit.source: Reset database after changing this settings!
trans-unit.target: Reset database after changing this settings!

trans-unit.source: Restart server after changing this settings!
trans-unit.target: Restart server after changing this settings!

trans-unit.source: config is not supported with these settings.
trans-unit.target: config is not supported with these settings.
Déclencher l'exécution de la tâche manuellement

trans-unit.source: Set the time to run the job.
trans-unit.target: Définir l'heure d'exécution de la tâche.

trans-unit.source: The job will run after that job finishes.
trans-unit.target: Cette tâche s'exécutera après la tâche courante.

trans-unit.source: Enables the job to start even if another job is already running.
trans-unit.target: Permet à la tâche de démarrer même si un autre travail est déjà en cours d'exécution.
